name: kofi-to-discord

description: A Cloudflare Worker that forwards Kofi donations to a Discord channel via a webhook.

KOFISECRET.description: Kofi Verification Token. This is used to verify that the request is coming from Kofi. Get in the [Advanced Drop Down](https://ko-fi.com/manage/webhooks) of your Kofi page.
